EmailTemplate.name: CwK.Re-Register
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Re-Register for COFFEE WITH KELLY - BILLING - Monthly Webinars
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Please Re-Register Monthly Customer Service Webinar Series Coffee with Kelly - Billing Every Second Tuesday of the Month
{{lead.First Name:default=EMS Billing Customer}} -
We're changing webinar platforms, and are asking you to please re-register now for your complimentary, monthly training for the TriTech EMS Billing software. The re-registration should take less than two minutes, and will ensure you continue to receive email invites to the live monthly trainings, as well as links to the recordings if you miss the live event. These half-hour tips and sips will help you keep your software skills and industry knowledge fresh!
November 13: Batch Credits December 11: Contract Write-off poster January 8: Customer Portal Knowledge Base Don’t miss the next session – register now! <http://offers.tritech.com/CwK-Billing_Registration.html>
If you cannot view the button above, please copy and paste this link into a browser window: http://offers.tritech.com/CwK-Billing_Registration.html
For information about TriTech's EMS Billing or ePCR cloud-based software - or other integrated EMS applications - please contact us at sales@tritech.com <mailto:sales@tritech.com> or 800-537-3927. Training Information: Complimentary Monthly Customer Service Webinar Series Every Second Tuesday of the Month 11:30 AM Eastern | 10:30 AM Central | 9:30 AM Mountain | 8:30 AM Pacific
All you need is an internet connection to join. Listen through your computer speakers, or dial in through a telephone. Every live session includes a question-answer session where you get your specific questions answered.
